segments.text: I'm surprised by how calm the woman is, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the kids are trying to sneak cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the sunlight from the window highlights the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm taken aback by how ordinary this scene is, yet filled with little dramas.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one has noticed the water overflowing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman hasn't slipped on the wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed by how much is happening in this one little kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just full of surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
